name: 1980s90s Style - Retro Track Car Racer
description:
"1980s90s Style - Retro Track Car Racer" is 3 games in one, "The main game is an America tour with 20 levels", "DLC 1 is Asian tour with 20 levels" and "DLC 2 is Europe tour with 20 levels".
It's a retro 1980s and 90s styled, track racing game, You are alone in the game. It's a single player game. But with the option to save multiple user profiles.
The ambiance in the game has 34 musics, with a simple retro look outdoor architecture style.
You should play each level many times to get better records.
It's a total 60 level game to do the checkpoints and the needed laps to the finish line.
Enjoy the retro styled music and Good luck!
